title: Quadratic Formula Derivation

content.derivation: For ax² + bx + c = 0, divide by a: x² + (b/a)x + c/a = 0. Complete square: x² + (b/a)x = -c/a. Add (b/(2a))²: x² + (b/a)x + (b/(2a))² = -c/a + (b²/(4a²)). Factor: (x + b/(2a))² = (b² - 4ac)/(4a²). Take square root: x + b/(2a) = ±√(b² - 4ac)/(2a). Solve for x.
content.explanation: The quadratic formula solves equations of the form ax² + bx + c = 0. It's derived by completing the square.
examples: Nigerian context: Calculate projectile height using quadratic equations in physics problems.

nigerian_context: Used in WAEC mathematics for solving real-world problems like profit maximization in Nigerian businesses.

title: Pythagoras Theorem and Applications

content.derivation: In a right-angled triangle, the square on the hypotenuse equals the sum of squares on the other two sides. Proof by rearrangement of four identical right triangles.
content.explanation: For a right-angled triangle with sides a, b, and hypotenuse c, this relationship always holds.
examples: Nigerian context: Calculate distance between Lagos and Abuja using coordinates and Pythagoras.

nigerian_context: Essential for surveying and construction in Nigerian infrastructure projects.

title: Sine Rule for Triangles

content.formula: a/sin A = b/sin B = c/sin C = 2R
content.derivation: Drop perpendicular from vertex to opposite side, creating right triangles. Express ratios using sine of angles.
content.explanation: Relates sides and opposite angles in any triangle, useful for solving non-right-angled triangles.
examples: In triangle ABC, a=5, A=30°, B=45° → b = 5 × sin45°/sin30° ≈ 7.07
Nigerian context: Navigation problems using triangulation in Nigerian geography.

nigerian_context: Applied in surveying Niger Delta oil fields and mapping Nigerian coastlines.

title: Basic Differentiation Rules

content.derivation: The derivative measures instantaneous rate of change. Power rule: d/dx(x^n) = n x^(n-1). Sum rule: d/dx[f+g] = f' + g'.
content.explanation: Calculus studies rates of change and accumulation, fundamental to advanced mathematics and physics.
examples: Nigerian context: Calculate marginal cost in economics for Nigerian manufacturing firms.

nigerian_context: Used in modeling population growth and economic trends in Nigeria.

title: Measures of Central Tendency and Dispersion

content.derivation: Mean is average value. Standard deviation measures spread around mean using squared differences.
content.explanation: Statistics summarizes and analyzes data, crucial for research and decision-making.
examples: Nigerian context: Analyze inflation rates from NBS data using mean and standard deviation.

nigerian_context: Essential for analyzing economic indicators and demographic data in Nigeria.
